content: Portland Timbers midfielder David Ayala will have season-ending surgery to repair a torn ACL, the team confirmed Tuesday.

Ayala, 20, sustained the injury to his left knee in Saturday's 2-1 win against St. Louis City SC.His reconstructive surgery will be performed by Dr. Richard Edelson on Monday in Portland, Ore. Ayala is looking at a rehab period of about nine months.Ayala started three of his four matches this season and has appeared in 25 games (11 starts) since joining the Timbers on Feb. 1, 2022.--Field Level Media
